title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Nap Rucker Throwing PSA 1.5
author: HawkFan70

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Nap Rucker Throwing PSA 1.5
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Polar Bear Nap Rucker Throwing graded PSA 1.5.  Card shows well with no creases.  There is some paper missing on the back near the bottom of the card.

Asking price is $ delivered PP F&F.  Shipping to the US only.

Let me know if you have any questions or would like a better scan.

I'll take it trumps any negotiation.

Thanks.
